snippet: A man who went on a shooting spree Tuesday in Tuscaloosa later turned himself in at a FedEx store in Jasper, saying he had hoped police would have killed him during the rampage.
abstract: Nathan Van Wilkins, who wounded 17 people in shooting spree in Tuscaloosa, Ala, is taken into custody and will probably be charged with attempted murder.
lead_paragraph: A man who went on a shooting spree Tuesday in Tuscaloosa later turned himself in at a FedEx store in Jasper, saying he had hoped police would have killed him during the rampage.

headline.main: Alabama: Man in Custody in Shooting Rampage
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Man In Custody In Shooting Rampage
